title: Create Supabase Project
description: Create a new project at https://supabase.com/dashboard

title: Get Project Credentials
description: Copy your project URL and anon key from Settings > API

title: Install Supabase CLI
description: Install the Supabase CLI for local development

title: Initialize Supabase
description: Initialize Supabase in your project directory

title: Link to Remote Project
description: Link your local project to your Supabase project

title: Generate TypeScript Types
description: Generate TypeScript types from your database schema
